subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Dirk Nowitzki scored 7 of his 30 points in a game-turning run to end the third quarter, and the host Dallas Mavericks won their seventh consecutive game against the Washington Wizards.
snippet: Dirk Nowitzki scored 7 of his 30 points in a game-turning run to end the third quarter, and the host Dallas Mavericks won their seventh consecutive game against the Washington Wizards.
